properties.displayName: Suspicious Office Token Search Via CLI
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains "eyJ0eXAiOi" or ProcessCommandLine contains " eyJ0eX" or ProcessCommandLine contains " \"eyJ0eX\"" or ProcessCommandLine contains " 'eyJ0eX'"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects possible search for office tokens via CLI by looking for the string "eyJ0eX". This string is used as an anchor to look for the start of the JWT token used by office and similar ap
